name: Basicare Dual Pencil Sharpener
description:
This Dual-Blade Makeup Pencil Sharpener proficiently sharpens your pencil with minimal waste. Just a quick twist and it gives your pencil a perfect sharp point, allowing an accurate and flawless application. This precision sharpener fits both large and small pencils. With a plastic cover firmly fastened to the sharpener, it collects pencil shavings.

TIPS: Pencil gets softer and becomes difficult to sharpen when it is hot. Leave it in the freezer for a few minutes before sharpening. On the other hand, makeup pencils do not work well when it is cold. You could warm it up by rolling between your hands.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
